title: Wire up page.tsx, layout.tsx, and fo-09-layout-client.tsx
description:
Create the page entry points for FO-09 by copying from FO-08 and updating references.

Files to create:
- app/fo-09/page.tsx (copy from fo-08, update component import to fo-09)
- app/fo-09/layout.tsx (copy from fo-08, update metadata title to FO-09)
- app/fo-09/fo-09-layout-client.tsx (copy from fo-08, update nav.config reference)

These are thin wrappers. The main changes are:
1. Import FOExperience from ./components/fo-experience (fo-09 version)
2. Update page title/metadata to say "FO-09"
3. Update layout-client to reference fo-09 paths

Reference:
- app/fo-08/page.tsx
- app/fo-08/layout.tsx
- app/fo-08/fo-08-layout-client.tsx

Do not close until acceptance criteria pass.
acceptance_criteria: Files app/fo-09/page.tsx, app/fo-09/layout.tsx, and app/fo-09/fo-09-layout-client.tsx all exist AND npm run build succeeds
